name: Blackberry Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': None, 'name': 'blackberries'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': None, 'name': 'mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'soda water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ice,'}
steps: Place sugar, lime juice, blackberries and mint leaves in an old fashioned glass, and mash well with a cocktail muddler. Add soda water and rum; stir. Fill with ice.

name: Thai Basil Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice,'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'fluid ounce', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '3/4', 'unit': 'fluid ounce', 'name': 'simple syrup'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': None, 'name': 'fresh Thai basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '1 1/2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'club soda'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'lime wedge (optional)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'Thai basil sprig (optional)'}
steps: Fill a collins glass with ice and set aside.. In a cocktail shaker, combine lime juice, simple syrup and Thai basil leaves. Use a muddler to crush the leaves for about 10 seconds. Add rum and 1 cup of ice. Seal and shake vigorously until outside is frosted, 10 to 15 seconds.. Strain mojito into the glass and top with club soda; gently stir. Garnish with lime wedge and Thai basil sprig, if desired.

name: The Real Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '10', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'lime, cut into 3 wedges, divided'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ice cubes, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'club soda, or as needed'}

name: Mojitos by the Pitcher
ingredients: {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '36', 'unit': 'leaves', 'name': 'fresh mint, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'limes, quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'rum (such as Bacardi)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'liter', 'name': 'club soda'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Muddle sugar and mint leaves together in a pitcher until leaves are well broken down.. Add limes and muddle until limes are juiced.. Pour rum into sugar mixture; add club soda and stir until sugar is dissolved.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Strawberry Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'white sugar, for rimming'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'limes, quartered'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': '', 'name': 'strawberries, quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'club soda'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice cubes'}
steps: Pour about 1/2 inch of sugar onto a small, shallow plate. Run a lime wedge around the rims of 8 cocktail glasses, then dip the rims into sugar to coat; set aside.. Squeeze all of the lime wedges into a sturdy glass pitcher. Toss juiced limes into the pitcher along with mint, strawberries, and 1 cup sugar. Crush with a muddler to release strawberry juice and mint oil. Stir in club soda and rum until sugar has dissolved.. Pour into the prepared glasses over ice cubes to serve.

name: Cuban Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, cut into 4 wedges'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh mint'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'crushed ice, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'club soda'}
steps: Place 1 teaspoon sugar each into two 12-ounce glasses. Squeeze juice from a lime wedge into each glass and drop in the wedge. Place 2 mint sprigs into each glass. Use a spoon or muddler to mash lime mixture together in the bottom of the glasses.. Fill each glass about half full with crushed ice. Pour 1/4 cup rum into each glass. Fill the glasses with club soda, stir, and garnish with remaining lime wedges.

name: Mint-Cucumber Mojitos
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, quartered'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'cucumber'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cubes', 'name': 'ice, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'white rum (such as Bacardi®)'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'club soda'}
steps: Squeeze the lime quarters into a highball glass, and drop the limes into the glass. Add the mint leaves and sugar. Muddle well with the back of a spoon or with a muddler. Place the cucumber slices into the glass, and fill with ice cubes. Pour in the rum, then top off with club soda. Stir gently and serve.

name: Patron Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'silver tequila (such as Patron®)'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'leaves', 'name': 'mint'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime wedges'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'club soda, or as needed'}
steps: Combine tequila, mint, sugar, and lime in a tall glass; mash mint and lime well with a cocktail muddler. Top with club soda and stir gently to serve.

name: Cocojito (Frozen Mojito)
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice cubes'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, rind removed'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'sweetened cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez)'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': '(1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers', 'name': 'white rum (such as Bacardi)'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'mint sprigs, for garnish'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime wedges, for garnish'}
steps: Blend together ice, limes, cream of coconut, rum, and mint leaves in a blender until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses and garnish each with a mint sprig and lime wedge.

name: Pineapple Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '10', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh pineapple'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'splash', 'name': 'club soda'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'wedge', 'name': 'fresh pineapple'}
steps: Muddle mint leaves, sugar, and pineapple in a highball glass.. Fill glass with ice cubes. Pour in pineapple juice and rum. Top with a splash of club soda. Garnish with pineapple wedge and remaining mint leaves.

name: Watermelon Mojitos
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cubed seedless watermelon'}, {'quantity': '50', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'simple syrup'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice cubes, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'club soda, or as needed'}
steps: Place watermelon cubes into a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into a bowl through a mesh strainer to remove pulp. Measure 2 cups strained watermelon juice and set aside.. Place mint leaves into the bottom of a pitcher. Pour in 1/2 of the watermelon juice; muddle mint leaves with a muddler or the bottom of a wooden spoon.. Pour in remaining watermelon juice, lime juice, rum, and simple syrup. Fill the pitcher with ice and top with club soda. Serve.

name: Captain's Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'wedges', 'name': 'lime'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'crushed ice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'simple syrup'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': "spiced rum (such as Captain Morgan's®)"}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'cranberry juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'soda water'}
steps: Place mint leaves, lime wedges, and ice into a cocktail shaker; mash well with a cocktail muddler. Pour in simple syrup, lime juice, rum, cranberry juice, and soda water. Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled glass to serve.

name: Fresh Raspberry Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': None, 'name': 'fresh mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': None, 'name': 'fresh raspberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'fluid ounce', 'name': 'simple syrup'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'fluid ounce', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'ice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'fluid ounce', 'name': 'raspberry-flavored vodka'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'fluid ounce', 'name': 'silver rum'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'club soda'}
steps: Muddle mint leaves, raspberries, simple syrup, and lime juice together in a shaker. Fill the shaker with ice and add vodka and rum; cover and shake until chilled. Pour entire contents of shaker into a Collins glass and top with club soda.

name: Mojito Perfecto
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, cut into 6 wedges'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers', 'name': 'lemon-flavored rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ice cubes, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'carbonated water, or as needed'}
steps: Put 3 mint leaves and 2 teaspoons sugar into each of 2 glass tumblers; vigorously stir sugar and mint together, crushing mint with the back of a spoon to release oils.. Add 3 lime wedges to each glass; again stir vigorously to release some lime juice.. Pour 1 jigger rum into each glass, then fill glasses with ice cubes. Top with carbonated water; stir.

name: Good Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'soda water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime wedge'}
steps: Muddle the lime juice, sugar, and mint leaves together in the bottom of a cocktail glass until the mint has broken down a bit, about 1 minute. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the rum and soda water over the ice. Pour the mixture back and forth from from the glass to another glass to mix. Garnish with the lime wedge and enjoy.

name: Guava Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh mint, divided'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'passion fruit-flavored rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'unsweetened guava nectar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'club soda, or as needed'}
steps: Fill a glass with ice.. Muddle 3 sprigs mint and sugar together in a cocktail shaker; add ice, rum, lime juice, and guava nectar. Cover and shake 10 times. Strain drink into glass filled with ice; add club soda and garnish with 1 mint sprig.

name: Summertime Strawberry Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'mint sprigs, plus more for garnish'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'strawberry syrup (such as Torani®)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chilled club soda'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice cubes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'Sugar for rimming glasses'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'strawberries, for garnish'}
steps: Juice 4 limes, yielding about 1/2 cup juice, and cut remaining lime into 6 wedges.. Grasp mint sprig stems and slap leaves against a work surface to help release their oil; transfer to a sturdy glass pitcher. Stir in lime juice, rum, and strawberry syrup. Add club soda.. Spread 1/4 to 1/2 inch sugar on a small, shallow plate. Run a lime wedge around the rim of each glass, then dip glass into sugar. Fill with ice. Pour in mojito mixture. Garnish with mint sprigs and strawberries.

name: Bubbly Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '10', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, quartered'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'sparkling white wine'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'crushed ice'}
steps: Place mint leaves and sugar in the bottom of a collins glass. Crush mint using a muddler. Add rum and lime slices to glass and muddle again. Top with sparkling wine and crushed ice.

name: Dragon Fruit Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '16', 'unit': 'leaves', 'name': 'fresh mint'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'light rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'dragon fruit, halved and flesh removed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'liter', 'name': 'chilled club soda'}
steps: Mix 2 tablespoons plus 2 teaspoons sugar with mint in the bottom of a highball glass.. Combine rum and dragon fruit flesh in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour rum mixture over the muddled mint mixture. Stir to incorporate.. Divide mixture between 4 double old-fashioned glasses. Top each drink with equal amounts of club soda.

name: Minty Mango Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh mango, peeled and cubed, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'coconut-flavored rum, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'club soda, or as needed'}
steps: Combine water and sugar in a small pot over medium heat. Whisk until sugar dissolves in the water. Add 12 mint leaves. Bring to a boil and whisk for 1 minute. Remove from heat and let cool, about 30 minutes.. Place lime and 12 mint leaves in a glass; mash together with a muddler to extract flavors. Add fresh mango; muddle until combined. Stir in 2 tablespoons of the mint simple syrup. Stir in coconut rum. Fill glass with ice and top with club soda. Stir 1 more time to distribute flavors.

name: The Mojito Cocktail
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh mint'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'fluid ounce', 'name': 'club soda'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, halved'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'light rum'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'club soda'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'sprig', 'name': 'fresh mint'}
steps: Muddle sugar and mint with soda water in pint glass. Squeeze both halves of lime into the glass leaving one hull in the mixture. Add rum, stir, and fill with ice. Top with club soda.. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Mojiteas
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tea bags'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh mint'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'boiling water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold water, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'light rum, or more to taste'}
steps: Place tea bags and mint sprigs into a large pitcher. Pour in boiling water; steep for 8 to 10 minutes. Remove tea bags and mint; before discarding, squeeze excess tea back into pitcher. Stir in sugar until dissolved; add orange juice and lemon juice. Pour in cold water and rum. Refrigerate at least 4 hours to overnight.

name: No-Sweat Mojito
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh mint, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'lime-flavored seltzer water'}
steps: Muddle 4 mint sprigs and sugar together in a mixing glass until crushed.. Add rum and stir to dissolve sugar. Strain into 2 ice-filled Collins or rocks glasses. Top with lime-flavored seltzer and garnish each glass with a remaining mint sprig.

name: Fruity Mojitos
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'spiced rum'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'slightly crushed fresh mint leaves, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons, quartered'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, quartered'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'oranges, quartered'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '(2 liter) bottles', 'name': 'lemon-lime carbonated beverage (such as 7Up®)'}
steps: Combine rum, sugar, and water in a larger container or 3-gallon cooler or drink dispenser until sugar is dissolved. Add mint, lemons, limes, and oranges and mix well. Allow flavors to combine for about 30 minutes. Pour lemon-lime beverage into rum-fruit mixture and stir to combine.
